item.title: Rachel add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "No man is brave that has never walked a hundred miles. If you want to know the truth of who you are, walk until not a person knows your name. Travel is the great leveler, the great teacher, bitter as medicine, crueler than mirror-glass. A long stretch of road will teach you more about yourself than a hundred years of quiet." -- Patrick Rothfuss

item.title: Rachel add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "In many ways, unwise love is the truest love. Anyone can love a thing because. That's as easy as putting a penny in your pocket. But to love something despite. To know the flaws and love them too. That is rare and pure and perfect." -- Patrick Rothfuss
